basic.description:
A study of the major economic, social and political themes. The emphasis is upon the interaction between political events and change in the economy and society.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: 20th-Century Canada

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST 124/6.0; HIST 278/3.0, HIST 279/3.0.	
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from HIST 260/6.0; HIST 278/3.0, HIST 279/3.0
